definition: Khyber province of Pakistan/Northwest Frontier province

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

sentences.english: Radio Khyber's three female reporters are on the air frequently.
sentences.chinese: 開伯爾電臺的三位女性記者經常在節目中播音。

sentences.english: Radio Khyber broadcasts for three hours each in the morning and evening.
sentences.chinese: 開伯爾電臺每天早晚各播送三小時。
